channel.title: Abouts on Jan's braindump
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Jan's braindump

item.title: about
item.description:
Developer and engineer. Obsessed with knowledge and interested in new tools.

Works @ iosphere GmbH as a full-stack-developer.

  • Building Android and iOS Apps
  • Designing and implementing REST-Apis using Golang, Java and Groovy
  • Improving our continuous deployment pipeline using Jenkins, Docker the Hasicorp Stack and Puppet

Studied Physics at the University of Cologne (Diploma in Theoretical Physics)
